title: Deputy Manager
tagsAndSkills: Electrical design,Heavy machinery,AutoCAD,Project management,CAD,Project planning,Engineering Design,HSE
jobDescription:
• Produce conceptual, basic, and detailed designs for projects as per IS and International Guidelines.
  • Day-to-day assistance in designing and assistance to team members in the delivery of projects.
  • Undertake technical and feasibility studies and site investigations.
  • Assist in proposal preparation and tender submission procedures.
  • Prepare and manage project execution plans, organization charts, and status reports.
  • Produce administration documentation such as requests for information.
  • Work closely and effectively with clients and internal project teams.
  • Provide technical advisory services to clients during the development & construction process.
  • Manage the project and steer the project team in order to deliver the project in time, within the budget, and according to the Customer Specification.
  • Collect and interpret information and translate this information into design specifications for the project team.
  • Play an active and coordinating role for various project teams / cross-functional teams
  • Manage various projects at a given time while ensuring that project delivery happens on time in full.
  • Completely responsible for project planning.
  • Close coordination with the Project Manager on all projects related to the division and with Service Delivery Heads for competence.
  • Provide technical support to the Junior Team.

Key Skills:

  • Proficient in CAD. Software experience in AutoCAD (full or LT) is required.
  • Experience in Electrical design is essential (Indian and overseas projects).
  • Methodical approach to problem-solving.
  • Ability to read and understand specifications and surveys.
  • Effective time & task management and leadership skills.
  • Excellent organization and verbal communication skills are essential.
  • Ability to use initiative to undertake tasks efficiently and independently.
  • Excellent written communication skills and attention to detail must be able to demonstrate accurate report writing.
  • Energetic and self-motivated, you must be a team player with a flexible approach.
  • Proficient in Gant chart programming.
  • Advanced in Microsoft Office.
  • General interest in electrical engineering, sustainable construction methods, and renewable energy is preferred.
  • Strong knowledge of HSE procedures and practices.
  • Proficient knowledge of project engineering processes and procedures.
  • Knowledge of proposals and bid processes.
  • Understands engineering estimate basis.
  • Understands contractual requirements for the project.
  • Immediate Joining is preferred.
  • The candidates staying at Navi Mumbai & Thane will be preferred.
  • Good communication skills.
  • conceptual Design HT, LV, and ELVS.
  • Basic Engineering HT, LV (MCC / PCC, LIGHTING, POWER SOCKETS LAYOUT, TRAYS, CABLE SELECTION, ELVS Design (CCTV, ACS, VOICE AND DATA NETWORKING ETC.)
  • Detailed Engineering preparation of construction drawings, Preparation of Tender, Technical.
  • Bid evaluation (TCS / TR ).
  • Should be very good at technical knowledge in Electrical field.
  • A good self-initiator with profound knowledge of the preparation of engineering drawings and documents.
  • Should be able to prepare all the drawings and documents own.
  • Very good proficiency in software skills is a must

title: Key Account Manager
tagsAndSkills: Automation,Sales operations,Client retention,Analytical,Technical sales,B2B Sales,Management,Electricals
jobDescription:
Take over key accounts from business development team.
Coordinate with customer, business development and operation team to ensure best service
and support with goal of achieving customer delight.
Define KPI s for customer and track them to enhance repeat sales.
Ensures subscription revenue target and client retention.
Increase repeat orders from an account.
Upsell and Crosssell to the existing customers.
Dealing with Contractors, Builders, Corporates and Institutions.
Assist in the execution of the Go-To-Market plans and the sales operations.
Building and maintaining the relationship with partners key decision makers.
Passionate about creating value for customers.

Candidate Skill Set
Go-getter with passion for technical sales
A team player with excellent analytical, problem solving skills
Experience in B2B selling of electrical and IoT based automation solutions/products.
Should have strong effective communication and negotiation skills.
Self-motivated and able to independently manage the clients.

Qualification
MBA or Bachelor degree in electrical or software related discipline or equivalent
experience.
Experience of 1-3 years in B2B as KAM in IoT/SaaS domain.
